channel.title: Physics (basic error)
channel.description:
Hi everyone, let's go to the point. If you jump in a train, you jump with the same horizontal speed. I don't speech very good english so here is an image to explain it better.
[img]https://media.ehs.uen.org/html/PhysicsQ2/Relative_Projectile_Motion__Acceleration_01/trainacc2.jpg[/img]
Why I telling you this?, well start a new game and try to jump in the monorail, you will see that Gordon stands in the air and don't take the train horizontal speed, so he "jump backwards". It's basic for a game and this is a very good game, we don't want to see that kind of things ruining this gift of the gods called blackmesasource.
